attributes.action: Force supermarkets to sell ' bags for life ' at every checkout, charge for the use of conventional plastic bags and provide incentives for customers to use bags for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1 million plastic bags are made every minute in the world and in the U.K we use 19 billion per year.  I believe making supermarkets do something about this is essential to the future of this planet.  These are the things i would like supermarkets to do; sell 'bags for life' at every checkout and promote them.  Charge for use of conventional plastic bags and provide incentives for consumers to not use plastic bags and instead use 'bags for life'.

rejection.details: THere is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/longlifebags/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
